about_the_game:
◆The hero's tale doesn't end with defeating the Daemon Lord—this time, the stage is the bistro you've opened!
Five years after vanquishing the Daemon Lord, peace has returned to the world. You, the hero, have realized your dream of opening a bistro.
Former companions and even past adversaries now visit your establishment.
Prepare meals and enjoy conversations while supporting them through their lives.
However, a new crisis looms in the shadows of these peaceful days...
The time has come for your culinary skills and kindness to once again shape the world's destiny.

◆Game Features
・Over 20 unique heroines!

From a dignified female warrior to a succubus onee-sama, and an airheaded bard, a diverse cast of charming characters awaits!

・Serve extraordinary fantasy cuisine

Offer 40 different exotic dishes, from Goblin Gem Soup to Behemoth Sirloin Steak!
Enjoy collecting the menu items you've prepared in your culinary encyclopedia!

・Engage in delightful conversations with characters

Uncover characters' worries and hidden feelings through counter-side chats
Discover surprising truths amid subtle foreshadowing in casual conversations!

◆Recommended for those who:

Love fantasy RPG worlds
Want to enjoy the relaxed atmosphere of an evening bistro
Enjoy both cooking and eating
Want to chat with cute girls

◆Credits
・BGM and SE materials
Hagali
Maou Damashii
Conte de Fées
OtoLogic
Koh-no-Oto
・UI Design
Kuusou Kyokusen

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters are adults, 18 years of age or older.
Characters wearing revealing clothing appear in this game.
